author: ilgrosso
msg: [SYNCOPE-25] Updating to latest glassfish required a Derby instance to be up and running on port 1527: unfortunately cargo does not seem able to launch it (asadmin start-database is not supported), so I ended up by adding a dedicated maven-antrun-plugin configuration inside the glassfish-it profile

author: julianfoad
msg: A code improvement in the merge code.  Redefine the file-scope
'merge_source_t' struct as two repo_location_t's instead of two URLs and two
revision numbers.  The number of changes is large but it's all basically a
(merge_source_t): Replace each (url, rev) pair with a repo_location_t.

author: markt
msg: Ensure Valve implements Lifecycle before calling Lifecycle methods

author: humbedooh
msg: Remove link to outdated (and deleted) question about ssl errors in old browsers.
